title: my lol is saying that the certificate is expired or invalid
body:
pls help 
i can get into login screen but i cant actually sign in and it comes up in a little pop up box

replies.body:
Hey there,

Please check to see if your [date/time settings are correct and synced](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues#wq3).

Let me know if the above helps.
